title: Podcasts reach the magical 1 million!
introText: There are now more than 1 million active podcast channels on Apple Podcasts.
bodyHtml:
After years of steady growth the number of active podcast channels available on Apple Podcasts crossed over the magical 1 million mark earlier this week.

This seismic event occurred a little sooner than initially anticipated, and the aceleration was likely attributable to the surge in Covid-19 podcasts.

As exciting as this news is, when one considers how many YouTube channels and Blogs there are (31 million and 600 million respectively) it's clear there's still an incredible amout of growth potential ahead.
